content: Content  Unit 1: Introduction to Design Framework                                    [8 hrs]
To provide knowledge of web design concepts and most recent UI/UX
is based on end semester written examination

6.      Learning Web Development with React and Bootstrap by Harmeet Singh  
7.      UI is communication By Everett N McKay  
8.      The UX Book , By Rex Hartson and Pardha Pyla
